name: Crystal Awakening
description:
Download: To play this game, unzip the file and double click on the New Unity Project (1).exe file in the folder. It may say that Windows has blocked this exe. This is a problem with exe files from Unity, not our game so please click more options and "run anyway." Please don't delete any of the other game files as those are essential to running the game.

If you're on Mac, you will have to install the other file named "hehrefd". To play it, double click on the MacOS folder and click on the Crystal Awakening file. 

Objective: Travel through each mystic biome (Snowy Ravine, forest, and canyon) with a magical staff to gather the lost enchanted crystals and place them back on the mountain pedestal in order to save this strange world and get back home.

How to Play/Game Control Functions List:

Press the keys W, A, S, D to move forward, backwards, left, and right, respectively. 

Press the spacebar key to jump.

Move the mouse to control the direction of the game perspective. 

Press the left mouse button to interact with an object (while the player is not using any abilities) or use the grappling hook. 

Bump into character to interact with them

Press the T key to toggle between abilities. If using the laser beam ability, press left click to fire. If using the trap ability, press left click to see traps. While using the grappling hook,  left-click on certain green glowing objects. Have fun!
